feed.title: Gull Island Rapids (Trans-Labrador Hwy) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Gull Island Rapids (Trans-Labrador Hwy)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 23 with temperature rising to minus 10 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 23 with temperature rising to minus 10 by morning. Wind chill minus 33 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then clearing. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High minus 15.
